document_data.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cloak of the manta ray''''' was a wondrous item that allowed its wearer to breathe underwater, and to move faster in water than normal.
document_data.Abilities: These cloaks were typically known for granting their wearers ''water breathing'' and faster movement in water. Though some were known to ''[[polymorph]]'' their wearer into the form of a [[manta ray]] upon entering a body of salt water.
document_data.History:
A ''cloak of the manta ray'' was located at the bottom of the River [[Sargauth]] near [[Skullport]]. The [[kuo-toa]] [[Hlool]] knew of its existence, and would give it as a gift to someone if they gave him food.

Some were believed to have been created by [[acolyte]]s of ancient water spirits.
